author: VNExplorer
title: Tyson Stock Falls as Company Suspends CFO
text: Tyson Foods suspended its chief financial officer, John R. Tyson, on Thursday, saying he was arrested for allegedly driving while intoxicated. The incident came a year and a half after the executive, who is the son of Chairman John H. Tyson, pleaded guilty to public intoxication and trespassing after he was found asleep in a stranger’s house. In an article about his arrest in that incident, The Wall Street Journal reported that he had apologized for his actions in a companywide email, saying he was receiving counseling on alcohol usage. The company said in a Thursday statement that it suspended John R. Tyson from his duties immediately. Curt Calaway, a senior finance executive at the firm, will take over as the interim CFO. A fourth-generation member of the Tyson family that founded the company, the executive came on board in 2019. The company replied with the statement about the suspension when asked to make John R. Tyson available for comment. According to Tyson Foods’ website, he has a bachelor’s degree from Harvard University and a master’s of business administration from Stanford University. He has previously worked in investment banking for J.P. Morgan as a private-equity and venture-capital investor. Tyson shares were down 1.2% in midday trading. Shares have fallen 2.6% so far this year. Write to Evie Liu at evie.liu@barrons.com

organizations.name: tyson stock falls as company suspends cfo tyson foods

author: Rosario Ticona
title: Peruana sorprende al cantar cumbia de Corazón Serrano: así reaccionó Lesly Águila al escucharla | Viral TikTok | VIDEO | Video viral | La República
text: Peruana sorprende al cantar cumbia de Corazón Serrano: así reaccionó Lesly Águila al escucharla Joven demostró su talento para la cumbia y muchos cibernautas indicaron que su voz es similar a la de Lesly Águila, cantante de Corazón Serrano. La cumbia está presente en cualquier parte del [Perú](https://larepublica.pe/tendencias/2024/03/12/cusco-turista-fue-expulsado-de-machu-picchu-al-caminar-en-sentido-contrario-y-dicen-hay-reglas-video-ciudadela-inca-viral-tiktok-parque-arqueologico-de-machu-picchu-440916). Una joven demostró su talento para el canto y deslumbró a cibernautas de la [plataforma de TikTok ](https://larepublica.pe/tendencias)y hasta la propia cantante de [Corazón Serrano](https://larepublica.pe/espectaculos/farandula/2023/09/12/lesly-aguila-de-corazon-serrano-responde-ante-rumores-de-embarazo-estrella-torres-1060236), [Lesly Águila](https://larepublica.pe/tag/lesly-aguila), reaccionó al clip. El video tiene cientos de visualizaciones y muchos piden viralizar el video. En este, se observa a la joven interpretando uno de los clásicos temas de la orquesta de Piura. PUEDES VER: [Trabajadora peruana la ‘rompe’ en discoteca de Cusco con extranjeros y dicen: "¿Buscan personal?"] Peruana sorprende al cantar cumbia de Corazón Serrano El video fue compartido por la cuenta Yaridmelgar en TikTok y muestra a la joven cantando la popular canción 'Olvídalo, corazón', de Corazón Serrano. La peruana incluso utiliza su control remoto como si se tratara de un micrófono. "Así que olvídalo corazón porque él ya no te ama. Entiende, es por tu bien, así que ya de una vez olvídalo, también olvídalo", cantó vivazmente y cientos de usuarios quedaron sorprendidos con su talento. La joven mostró bastante dominio vocal y emotividad al interpretar dicho tema. PUEDES VER: [Español queda decepcionado al conocer la Montaña de colores: asegura que no se parece a internet] Lesly Águila reaccionó sobre clip viral de peruana Una de las principales voces de la agrupación Corazón Serrano, Lesly Águila, fue etiquetada en el clip viral de TikTok y no dudó en comentar. La artista resaltó el talento de la peruana y la animó a persistir en sus sueños. "¡Qué lindo cantas!", mencionó la artista de 29 años. Artista reaccionó a clip viral de joven peruana. Foto: composición LR/Leslie Águila/TikTok Usuarios reaccionaron a clip viral de peruana "Muy parecida a la voz de Lesly Águila", "Deberías ir al casting de La Bella Luz", "Lesly Águila tiene tu misma voz", "Esa voz cuadra en Corazón Serrano", "Que no lo vea Edwin Guerrero, por favor, La Bella Luz una oportunidad", "Corazón Serrano, ojito aquí", "Más técnica vocal y estás lista, bendiciones, sigue adelante. No te rindas, no olvides que siempre habrá alguien con más experiencia. Lucha por ser mejor", "Vas por un buen camino, tienes talento", "Me recuerdas a Nicol Sinchi en sus inicios, igualita. Sé que llegarás lejos sin miedo al éxito, atrévete, ve a los castings", "Próxima vocalista de Corazón Serrano", "Que bonito cantas y eso que no escucho cumbia", "Hermosa voz y qué sentimientos le pones a cada letra que interpretas, sigue adelante", resaltaron usuarios en TikTok. PUEDES VER: [Cesar Acuña responde a sus críticos por sus singulares discursos: “A más obras, más memes”] ¿Cuántos años tiene Lesly Águila de Corazón Serrano? Leslie Katherine Águila Córdova es una cantante peruana de cumbia. Ganó fama en Perú y otros países como vocalista de la agrupación Corazón Serrano, en la cual permanece hasta la actualidad. Ella es natural de Huancabamba, Piura. Cuando nació, sufrió la pérdida de su hermana gemela, quien murió víctima de una negligencia médica. En la actualidad, Lesly Águila tiene 29 años y el próximo 17 de junio del 2024 cumplirá 30 años. Entre las canciones de la artista que más destacan con Corazón Serrano están las siguientes: - 'Te extrañaré' - 'Enséñame a olvidar' - 'La mejor decisión' - 'Olvídame'. Egresada de la carrera de Periodismo en la Universidad Nacional de San Agustín (UNSA). Un año de experiencia como videorreportera. Dedicada al periodismo digital desde hace 5 años en La República. Gusto por temas de tendencia y espectáculos.

author: Christianity Daily
title: Church News | Rick Warren Faces Backlash for Interpretation of the Crucifixion | Christianity Daily
text:
Former Saddleback Church founder and pastor Rick Warren faced backlash on social media for suggesting that Jesus Christ would be a political centrist today, based on the fact that He was crucified between two thieves.
In a tweet on Tuesday, citing John 19:18, Warren stated, “They crucified Jesus with two others—one on each side and Jesus in the middle. The guys on both sides were thieves.” He added, “If you’re looking for the #realJesus, not a caricature disfigured by partisan motivations, you’ll find him in the middle, not on either side.”
Several prominent Christian figures on X criticized Warren's interpretation of the biblical text. Babylon Bee managing editor Joel Berry remarked, “If you’re going to misuse the story this bad, you should also point out that the thief on the Right is the one that went to heaven lol.”
Justin Peters, who leads a worldwide expository preaching and teaching ministry, rebuked Warren's biblical interpretation, writing, “This is, sadly, typical of Rick Warren's approach to scripture. This would have been laughed out of biblical hermeneutics on day 1. Basic hermeneutics dictates that you strive for authorial intent, and this is definitively NOT the point the author was making. This is not only embarrassing, it is inexcusable.”
Aaron Edwards, a theology lecturer at Cliff College in Derbyshire, England, tweeted, “Your Jesus sounds more like a lukewarm moderate in your own image.”
Ryan Visconti, pastor of Generation Church in Arizona, argued that Warren's call for political moderation has become outdated and is impractical given current leftist policies. He stated, “How would one be 'in the middle' on abortion, mutilating kid’s genitals, homosexuality, open borders, DEI, CRT, etc? There’s no middle ground between evil and righteousness. You’re wrong, Pastor Rick. Your approach made sense in 1990, but not today.”
Author and podcast host Eric Metaxas called Warren’s tweet “misleading posturing.” He questioned, “What does it even mean? Shall we be 'in the middle' when it comes to standing against killing babies or mutilating kids or corruption in our own govt? There is a time to be bold as lions against evil! That's not 'partisan.' It's the Lord's will,” he wrote.
Attorney Jenna Ellis stated, “Jesus is not a moderate or 'in the middle' when it comes to truth. To characterize him as such simply because of the placement of his cross is perverting an historical fact into a symbolic meaning to serve your own ideological agenda.”
Megan Basham, author and Daily Wire reporter, responded to Ellis' tweet, saying, “It's so bad my jaw is on the floor.” She also suggested that Warren's influence over the Evangelical community may have contributed to its current theological weaknesses, stating, “The fact that this is the pastor from whom millions of Americans found spiritual guidance for years explains a lot about the state of our theology.”
In 2023, the Southern Baptist Convention upheld Saddleback Church's removal from the denomination for allowing a woman to serve as a teaching pastor, despite Warren's impassioned pleas.
